title: #105: Continuing Analysis of Mindhunter
description:
Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti continue their analysis of the Netflix series Mindhunter. This episode they specifically examine the character of Jerry Brudos, played by character actor Happy Anderson.


New to Real Crime Profile? Never miss an episode by subscribing today at smarturl.it/realcrimw
